This is the website of the Guernsey R Users Group.
We'll post talk materials and details of events here as they are organised.

You can see our upcoming and past events on the [events](events.qmd) page.

If you would like to join us, would like to present, or would like to ask any questions, please do email [guernseyrusersgroup@gmail.com](mailto:guernseyrusersgroup@gmail.com) or fill in the forms below.

::: {.panel-tabset}
